ygData.subject: WTF
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I tried to make a few telesopes last night, but i even failed at the fishing poles and they are trivial ? what the hell is that i failed 8 times out of 10
ygData.messageBody:
Hi



I tried to make a few telesopes last night, but i even failed at the fishing poles and they are trivial ? what the hell is that i failed 8 times out of 10 on them. so in the end it cost me
2000-300 pp (not sure didnt look how much i hadde on me when i started) to make 2 Telescopes. I sold 1 for 90 pp. So if i am gonna make any more of them i wont sell for under 100 Plat, itï¿½s just not worth it.



Askur Gnomish Wizard of Veeshan
